effect.sun_moon: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.

flavor_text.sun_moon: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
